TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPointCustomProperties extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: Defines custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.

span.span: Defines custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 클래스는 색, 배경 이미지, 해칭, 등의 사용 예: 사용자 지정 속성을 정의합니다.This class defines custom properties such as colors, the use of background images, hatching, and so forth. 클래스 클래스 및 속성 모두이 클래스 로부터 파생 됩니다.The class, class and the property are all derived from this class.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The series that the data point belongs to.

param.name: pointProperties
param.span: A flag that indicates whether this is a data point custom property.

span.span: A flag that indicates whether this is a data point custom property.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series and custom properties flag.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series and custom properties flag.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.KeywordsStringEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point.

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point.

summary.span: This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant object.

span.span: This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant object.

value.span: A x 축 레이블 텍스트를 나타내는 값입니다.

span.span: A value that represents the text of the X-axis label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 속성에는 데이터 요소를 계열 또는 빈 요소에 대 한 축 레이블을 설정합니다.This property sets the axis label for a data point, series or an empty point. 이 속성에 대해 런타임 시 설정할 수 있습니다는 개체입니다.This property can only be set at run time for a object. 이 속성을 설정 또는 개체를 데이터 요소가 모두이 레이블을 사용 합니다.If you set this property or a object, all of its data points will use this label. 경우는 속성이 설정 되지 않은 및 사용자 지정 레이블이 지정 되지 않은, 축 레이블이 축 눈금을 사용 하 여 자동으로 생성 됩니다.If the property is not set and a custom label has not been specified, an axis label will be generated automatically using the axis scale. 빈 요소 레이블을 사용 하 여 설정 되는 속성입니다.Empty point labels are set using the property.
